project1.title: Verge3D Xpomania Booth
project1.description: Interactive web experience featuring 3D models of booths for the Xpomania exhibition. Built using Verge3D toolkit.
project1.contribution:
1. Create interactions using hotkeys to show detailed features and spots of the booth displayed, such as posters, videos, receptionist, meeting areas, etc.
2. Implementing feature to various types of booth models from small, medium, and large
3. Build and deploy to webGL so it can be displayed via a web browser

project2.title: NUS BAM
project2.description: VR simulation to simulate the procedures for covid-19 lab test. Built using Unreal Engine 4.27 for desktop VR (HP Reverb G2)
project2.contribution:
1. Contributed on programming, gameplay scenario (2 of 3 scenarios), 3D model and animation implementation, UI interaction, VR controller and interaction, sound, etc.
2. Architecture and feature implementation of the whole game based on the client needs
3. Integrating game scoring system and game logs to the client's LMS system

project3.title: TTSH 6S VR Training
project3.description: VR simulation to simulate and re-arrange the 6S (Safety, Sort, Straighten, Shine, Standardise and Sustain) procedures. Built using Unity for mobile VR (Oculus Quest 2)
project3.contribution:
1. Initiate the project and contributed on programming, gameplay scenario (1 of 3 scenarios), 3D model and animation implementation, UI interaction, VR controller and interaction, sound, etc.
2. Architecture and feature implementation of the whole game based on the client needs
3. Integrating game scoring system output to the .csv file and save it locally

project4.title: SUSS Anechoic Chamber VR Experience
project4.description: VR simulation to simulate sound wave transmission in anechoic chamber and there are a number of multiple choice questions to test the player's knowledge. Built using Unity for mobile VR (Oculus Quest 2)
project4.contribution:
1. Contributed on programming, gameplay scenario, 3D model implementation, UI interaction, VR controller and interaction, sound, etc.
2. Architecture and feature implementation of the whole game based on the client needs
3. Create quiz system with scores based on material provided by the client

project5.title: SUSS Filmmaking Lighting and Camera VR Simulation
project5.description: VR simulation to simulate lighting setup and camera movement in film making context. Lighting simulation and camera simulation are in separated project. Built using Unreal Engine 5.2 for desktop VR (HP Reverb G2)
project5.contribution:
1. Contributed on programming, gameplay scenario, 3D model and animation implementation, UI interaction, VR controller and interaction, sound, etc.
2. Architecture and feature implementation of the whole game based on the client needs
3. Create and implement functions to capturing photo(lighting project) and recording video(camera project)
4. Create gallery and video player system to review the photo and video captured
5. Conduct Unreal Engine training sessions for SUSS staff

project6.title: Jungle River Kayak VR
project6.description: Kayak adventure simulation game. Built using Unreal Engine 5.2 for desktop VR. Tested in HP Reverb G2 and Oculus Quest 2 and 3 using Meta Quest Link
project6.contribution:
1. Contributed on programming, feature enhancements, particle effect implementation, UI interaction, VR controller and interaction, sound, etc.
2. Enhance kayak paddle movement calculations to be more accurate
3. Added some obstacles along the river path

project7.title: FloNa Savior
project7.description: Augmented Reality-based educational application about the conservation of endangered animals and plants. Built using Unity for Android mobile device. Project used as my thesis for bachelor degree.
project7.contribution:
1. Contribute to the entire project development process
2. Create quiz system with time limit and score
3. Create AR gameplay using vuforia plugin in Unity
4. Conducting research and collecting information related to several endangered animals and plants
